titleStmt.title: An explanation of the generall Epistle of Saint Iude. Delivered in one and forty sermons, by that learned, reverend, and faithfull servant of Christ, Master Samuel Otes, parson of Sowthreps in Norfolke. Preached in the parish church of Northwalsham, in the same county, in a publike lecture. And now published for the benefit of Gods church, by Samuel Otes, his sonne, minister of the Word of God at Marsham
titleStmt.author: Otes, Samuel, 1578 or 9-1658.
Otes, Samuel, d. 1683.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Elizabeth Purslow for Nicholas Bourne, and are to be sold at his shop, at the south entrance of the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: An exposition upon the Epistle of Saint Iude.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop, at the south entrance of the Royall Exchange
